Translations.Text: Mat rad for those disbelieve bol the same them; whether ona warn them nie warn them they nie verit
GOD ZAPECATIT ICH ZMYSLANIE ICH hearing ICH OCI ZAVOJ. They incurred severe retribution
Potom there bol those say My verit v GOD Posledny Dni chvila they nie bol believers
Do trying klamat GOD those verit they len klamat without zbadat
Do ich zmyslanie there bol disease Consequently GOD zvacsit ich disease They incurred painful retribution for ich laicky
When they told nie commit zly they say my bol righteous
Skutocne they bol evildoers they nie zbadat
When they told Verit ludia verit they say Shall my verit mat rad fools verit? skutocne bol they je fools they nie zauzlit
When they schodza believers they say My verit when alone ich devils they say My je s ona; my len mocking
GOD mocks them leads them ICH transgressions blundering
bol they kupit straying guidance! Such zivnost never prospers nor robit they receive any guidance
